hadiths.text: It was narrated that Anas bin Malik said:“I heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say several times: ‘By the One in Whose Hand is the soul of Muhammad, the family of Muhammad does not have a Sa’ of food grains or a Sa’ of dates.’ And at that time he had nine wives.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَعِيشَةِ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ
chapter.eng-name: The livelihood of the family of Muhammad (ﷺ)
